description: A comedy sketch show centered around All That (1994) alum Amanda Bynes.
keywords: laugh track,parody comedy,character name in series title,spoof,spin off
name: The Amanda Show

review.name: The Reason I Love My Childhood
review.reviewBody:
Amanda Bynes is so funny coming from "All That" and she is so charismatic and enjoyable to watch. This also spawned a spin-off sitcom called "Drake & Josh". So many good thins about this show.

The jokes are clean-humored yet hilarious. I remember seeing all the episodes and loving all the sketches. Spoofs on Blockbuster, Judge Judy, Survivor, Who Wants To Be A Millionaire, and other pop culture references are one of the many reasons this show will always be funny. Even thought repetitive, those Hillbilly Moments are slapstick and always give me a good laugh.

This show is so nostalgic of my childhood. I also remember LFO performing, which was also something amazing. This TV show was one of the funniest kids show I have ever seen. Miss Bynes, we love you!
